Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Service Delayed at 54th Cermak
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at 54th/Cermak  due to mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at 54th/Cermak  due to mechanical problemon a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #72 NorthTemporary Eastbound  Reroute near North Avenue/Laramie
ShortDescription: 72 North Eastbound buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave, Central, Division and Laraime due to,street blockage near North Avenue/Laramie

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#72 North Eastbound buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave, Central, Division and Laraime due to,street blockage near North Avenue/Laramie.


Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #57 LaramieTemporary Southbound Reroute near North Ave/Laramie
ShortDescription: 57 Laramie Southbound buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, North Ave, Central and Division:due to, street blockage near North Ave/Laramie

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#57 Laramie Southbound buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, North Ave, Central and Division: due to, street blockage near North Ave/Laramie.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 California, #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Homan and Division
ShortDescription: Northbound 94 California and 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Division, Cicero, Fullerton and Homan due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California and #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Division, Cicero, Fullerton and Homan due to street blockage near Homan and Division.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
